## Discussion

The URL describes the location of the DNS server, such as “https://dnsserver.example.net/dns-query”. See [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8484] for more details. The associated server addresses you provide are hints for which well-known DNS server addresses to use.

# NWParameters.PrivacyContext.ResolverConfiguration.https(_:serverAddresses:)

**Case**

A DNS-over-HTTPS resolver configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
case https(URL, serverAddresses: [NWEndpoint])
```

## Discussion

The URL describes the location of the DNS server, such as “https://dnsserver.example.net/dns-query”. See [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8484] for more details. The associated server addresses you provide are hints for which well-known DNS server addresses to use.

## Resolver Types

- **NWParameters.PrivacyContext.ResolverConfiguration.tls(_:serverAddresses:)**: A DNS-over-TLS resolver configuration.
title: NWParameters.PrivacyContext.ResolverConfiguration.https(_:serverAddresses:)
